tool_description: Generate a random number between two values.
name: Random Number Generator
title: Random Number Generator

api_list.name: Get a number  between two given values.
api_list.description: If you want to ganerate a number between two given values you can use this endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com/50/1000"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com/{minvalue}/{maxvalue}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Default value between 1 and 10.
api_list.description: By default, this route will respond with a random number between 1 and 10.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a  number between minimum value and 10.
api_list.description: if you want a number between a minimum value and 10. you can use this route but the minimum value must be less than 10.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com/4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-number-generator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
